timeline.message:
Refactor presto-thrift-connector-api

* Rename to presto-thrift-api
* Have separate package for datatypes, valuesets and connector

timeline.author: caithagoras
caithagoras
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@

+package com.facebook.presto.thrift.api.udf;
+
+import com.facebook.drift.TException;
+import com.facebook.drift.annotations.ThriftField;
+import com.facebook.drift.annotations.ThriftMethod;
+import com.facebook.drift.annotations.ThriftService;
+import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture;
+
+@ThriftService(value = "presto-udf", idlName = "PrestoThriftUdfService")
+public interface PrestoThriftUdfService
+{
+    @ThriftMethod("prestoInvokeUdf")
+    ListenableFuture<PrestoThriftUdfResult> invokeUdf(
+            @ThriftField(name = "functionHandle") PrestoThriftFunctionHandle functionHandle,
+            @ThriftField(name = "inputs") PrestoThriftUdfPage inputs)

timeline.author: caithagoras
caithagoras

replies.bodyText: Are they going to be translated to the same thrift idl?
replies.author: rongrong
